title: How do I JUNGLE?
body:
I am absolutely terrible at jungle. I have no intuition of where I should be and how to make an impact, besides "gank if the enemy is pushed" or "farm camps if nobody is pushed", which probably isn't even correct half the time (I always see streamers call for a tower dive if they're top lane or simply see junglers making dive plays, but I rarely recognize these situations in game).

When exactly should I be farming the jungle? At what times should I gank? Where should I place wards? What's generally the route that people take nowadays? What trinket should I get? When should I make my first back? What _items_ should I get my first back? Is Chilling Smite just 100% the best Smite? If I get some early kills, should I just always be ganking to try to snowball the game? And etc., anything else that I'm not thinking about right now.

Anyways, can anyone offer some general jungling tips or link a good guide? Mostly I get outdated guides (like when there were Sight Wards) or champion specific jungle guides when I search up something.

Thanks guys!
